title: Google Apps for Personal and Business Use
headline: Learn about the essential skills needed to become a Google Apps expert with this free online course.
description: Google Apps are powerful online applications geared toward improving your efficiency. This course introduces you to the essential apps for business and personal use by explaining the use of Gmail, Google Blogger and Google Sites. You will also explore the benefits of Google Drive and learn how to use Google Docs and Sheets in your day-to-day activities. Whether you are a beginner or seeking to upgrade your skills, this course is suitable for all.
courseDescription:
Discover some of the most important Google Apps needed for everyday use and business productivity by gaining an accurate understanding of their functionality. What can you expect from these apps? They are powerful web apps that help all individuals and organisations in their day-to-day activities. You will become familiar with Gmail, Google Blogger and Google Sites through this course.

Becoming proficient requires organisation so it is vital to store important documents in a safe place. On that account, Google Drive is one of the most essential and secure forms of online storage with global recognition. This course will thus introduce you to Google Drive and help you learn how to access and add files and folders. Moreover, you will discover how to share Google Drive files and folders with others online and become acquainted with the operation of two essential work productivity applications: Google Docs and Google Sheets.

What can you expect from gaining practical knowledge of these apps? By the end of this course, you will have a substantial understanding of Gmail, Google Blogger and Google Sites. Consequently, you will know how to use Google Drive, Google Docs and Google Sheets and gain familiarity with cloud computing, which will help you become efficient with any tasks you face.
